title: Anyway to get a model?
body:
I know about Lolking having player models on display, but what about the weapons? I'm coding a weapon for the game Garry's mod and I'm not the best 3d modeler. Honestly I was looking online for a model but couldn't find anything. I was wondering if anyone knew anywhere to get the model (For free anyways I'm not paying 45 dollars for a weapon model for a weapon I'm coding for free and yes, I saw that.)

More specifically, Jhin's gun.

replies.body: You can break the user agreement and mess around with programs that lift DX assets, but that is probably not going to get you anywhere, except maybe flagged for hacking.
